title: The Purple River: An Adventure Novel
description: Jackson and an old college friend join a group of kayakers in a trip down Idaho’s Salmon River in what is supposed to be a relaxing getaway from everyday life. But soon a flooded, swollen river upends their peaceful float, uncovering danger, deceit, and a battle for survival. Jackson’s unremitting attraction to Jordan’s sandy hair, athleticism, and sassy attitude, unlocks a budding love affair and creates a sizzling matchup.Packed full of action and suspense, the Purple River is a story you will not want to miss.
author: Rick Glaze
